code: function Validation(logs){var errors={};var email_pattern=/^(([^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+(\.[^<>()[\]\\.,;:\s@\"]+)*)|(\".+\"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;var password_pattern=/(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z]).{8,}$/;if(logs.email===""){errors.email="Name should not be empty";}else if(!email_pattern.test(logs.email)){errors.email="Email does not match";}else{errors.email="";}if(logs.pass===""){errors.pass="Password should not be empty";}else if(!password_pattern.test(logs.pass)){errors.pass="Password does not match";}else{errors.pass="";}return errors;}export default Validation;
